bibl.title: Paniskos and Heliodoros: A Strategic Pair.
bibl.note: Paniskos as basilikos grammateus (from about 63 to 60 B.C.). - Paniskos as strategos (from 60 to 55 B.C.). - Heliodoros as basilikos grammateus (from 60 to 55 B.C.). - Heliodoros as strategos (from 55 to sometime in 51 B.C.).

bibl.title: Acta Demotica. Acts of the Fifth International Conference for Demotists. Pisa, 4th-8th September 1993

bibl.seg: OATES John F., Paniskos and Heliodoros: A Strategic Pair.
Acta Demotica. Acts of the Fifth International Conference for Demotists. Pisa, 4th-8th September 1993 = EVO 17 (1994) pp. 225-230.

Paniskos as basilikos grammateus (from about 63 to 60 B.C.). - Paniskos as strategos (from 60 to 55 B.C.). - Heliodoros as basilikos grammateus (from 60 to 55 B.C.). - Heliodoros as strategos (from 55 to sometime in 51 B.C.).
